name: SAVE RARE TREATMENTS TASK FORCE
description: Dedicated to restoring the spirit of R&D incentives in the Orphan Drug Act.
sampleDescriptions: Work with Congress and the Administration to ensure that the Orphan Drug Exclusion from eligibility for negotiation under the Medicare Drug Price Negotiation Program allows products to remain excluded
